entity5.name: ant colony

entity6.name: ant

entity7.name: colony

entity8.name: Ant colonies

entity9.name: Queen
entity9.description: The female ant responsible for laying eggs in an ant colony, often the largest member and central to the colony's survival.

entity10.name: Male ants

entity11.name: Worker ants
entity11.description: Sterile female ants that perform various tasks such as foraging, nest maintenance, and caring for larvae within an ant colony.

entity12.name: Soldier ants
entity12.description: Specialized worker ants with larger bodies and stronger mandibles that defend the colony against predators and other threats.

entity13.name: queen ant
entity13.description: The primary reproductive female in an ant colony, responsible for laying eggs and ensuring the continuity of the population.

entity14.name: colony
entity14.description: A community of ants living together, organized around one or more reproductive females.
